bullet_points: Search ArXiv for papers published in the specified date range.
Focus on the topics selected by the user (LLM, Computer Vision, RL, etc.).
Filter papers by relevance and impact based on citations and venue.
Extract key information: title, authors, abstract, date, arxiv ID.
sub_tasks.sub_task: Search and collect ArXiv papers for the specified date range and topics.

bullet_points: Search GitHub for major releases in AI/ML repositories.
Focus on popular frameworks and tools (PyTorch, TensorFlow, HuggingFace, etc.).
Identify significant version updates and new features.
Extract release notes and changelog information.
sub_tasks.sub_task: Collect GitHub releases and updates from major AI/ML projects.

bullet_points: Search tech blogs from major AI companies (Anthropic, OpenAI, Google, Meta, etc.).
Identify announcements, research highlights, and product launches.
Extract key information and dates.
If sources parameter includes conferences, also search for conference announcements.
sub_tasks.sub_task: Gather information from tech blogs and AI news sources.

bullet_points: Analyze each collected item for technical significance and real-world impact.
Categorize items by topic (LLM, Computer Vision, RL, etc.).
Assign impact levels: High, Medium, or Low based on novelty and potential.
Identify breakthrough developments vs incremental improvements.
Extract key features, improvements, and innovations from each item.
sub_tasks.sub_task: Analyze and categorize all collected information with impact assessment.

bullet_points: Generate concise summaries (2-3 sentences) for each item.
Highlight the key innovation or contribution.
Explain practical implications and potential applications.
Use clear, accessible language suitable for the target audience.
sub_tasks.sub_task: Create AI-powered summaries for each collected item.

bullet_points: Select 3-5 most impactful items as top headlines.
Group remaining items by topic category.
Structure content according to the report style (brief/standard/detailed).
Include metadata: source, date, impact level, and links.
Format as professional newsletter with clear sections and hierarchy.
Add introduction highlighting key trends and themes of the week.
sub_tasks.sub_task: Format and structure the final AI Tech Weekly Report.
